gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson` MUST also be reported, because at least one of the underlying values of `NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson` MUST be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsTripleAndMultiplePersonHouseholdsHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfAssignmentsPerRentalLimitTripleAndMultiplePerson return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
